School

Coding

I like to learn to code. Most days, I can be found researching some new method of coding. I am subscribed to Bitsbox, a kids coding subscription, that teaches me how to build new apps.

Sharks

Sharks are cool! Did you know there were sharks alive when the dinosaurs were alive?

Minecraft

I love to build new worlds in Minecraft! I talk about what I am building to my Aunt and Uncle and drive them crazy!

Personal

I am a kid who lives with my Aunt and Uncle. I was born in Arkansas, but I live in Idaho now. I have a sister and lots of cousins.
